turns.en: You’re making a phone call. Ask for the person/department and confirm details.
turns.zh: 你在打電話。先找對人/部門，再確認細節。

turns.hint_en: Hi, may I speak to customer service, please?

turns.en: This is customer service. How can I help?
turns.zh: 這裡是客服，請問需要什麼協助？

turns.hint_en: My SIM stopped working. Could you help me troubleshoot?

turns.en: Sure. What phone model are you using?
turns.zh: 可以。你用什麼手機型號？

turns.hint_en: I’m using an iPhone 13. Also, do I need to restart my phone first?

turns.en: Yes, restart first. Then check if cellular data is on.
turns.zh: 對，先重開機，再確認行動數據有開。

turns.hint_en: Okay. If that doesn’t work, should I reset network settings?

turns.en: Yes, that’s the next step. It won’t delete your data, but it will reset Wi‑Fi passwords.
turns.zh: 對，下一步是重置網路設定。不會刪資料，但會清掉 Wi‑Fi 密碼。

turns.hint_en: So resetting network settings won’t delete my data, but it will remove Wi‑Fi passwords, right?

turns.en: Exactly. Call us back if it still doesn’t work.
turns.zh: 沒錯。如果還不行再打回來。
